title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.20-j - Adherence to the Electronically Stored Information ("ESI") Guidelines Set Forth in Appendix Hereto
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.20-j - Adherence to the Electronically Stored Information ("ESI") Guidelines Set Forth in Appendix Hereto

State Regulations

Parties and nonparties should adhere to the Electronically

Stored Information ("ESI") Guidelines set forth in Appendix A hereto. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
